module.title: Projects
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>projects`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>projects` ( `projectId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectId`), KEY `access` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_versions`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_versions` ( `projectVersionId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `projectId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `version` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectVersionId`), KEY `projectId` (`projectId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>projects`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>project_versions`;
